lines.text: You couldn't stop being a thief any more than a weasel could stop sucking chicken blood.
Oh, now don't turn ordinary on me. I get tired of ordinary dames. And I don't want to get tired of you.
She's shakin' like a dice box.
Is there any dame you haven't got in your pocket?
Does that young woman ever do anything besides make exits?
When you've been where I've been you can never get enough company.
You keep me around because even Johnny Eager has to have one friend.
